code: import React from'react';import logo from'../FooterComponent/Images/Facebook_logo_.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var JoinFacebook=function JoinFacebook(){var channelLink="fb://page/my_facebook_page";var fallbackUrl="https://facebook.com/my_facebook_page";var handleButtonClick=function handleButtonClick(){var isFacebookInstalled=window.matchMedia("(platform: iphone)").matches||window.matchMedia("(platform: android)").matches;if(isFacebookInstalled){window.open(channelLink,"_blank");}else{window.open(fallbackUrl,"_blank");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"facebook_text",onClick:handleButtonClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"facebook-img",alt:"Facebook logo"})});};export default JoinFacebook;
